plot: Mabel is in charge of the Mystery Shack after making a bet with Stan to see who can the most money in three days, and determine which of them is the better boss.

Mabel bets Grunkle Stan she'll make more money at the Mystery Shack by treating people nicely than he does by being rude and cranky. He heads off to win a fortune on a TV game show while she deals with lazy employees and a real monster captured by Dipper. She soon realizes why Stan is such an unbearable grouch.—Jay Phelps <jaynashvil@aol.com>
